content:
According to my own test, multiple email addresses in "To" field are allowed, but only if the addresses are entered one at a time.

Method 1: Tap "To" field > enter one address > enter character "," (comma) > enter another address > enter character "," (comma).

Method 2: Tap "To" field > enter one address > press "enter" key > tap "To" field again > enter another address > press "enter" key.

The following method is not allowed: Copy a string of multiple addresses separated by commas > tap "To" field > paste that string.
creator: Yu5tiqX9og
